1405910.name: DwarfHeim: Supporter-Pass
1405910.description:
Did you enjoy DwarfHeim and want to help support our future development and DwarfHeim? Then the DwarfHeim Supporter-pass allows you to do just that!

Help us build DwarfHeim, support the developers and get some exclusive cosmetic items only available for our Supporters:
  • 6 Supporter only golden armor for the Thanes of DwarfHeim
  • 4 Unique golden tools available for Supporters
  • Golden variations of all the units in the game.
  • Golden variations of the Forge, Monastery, University, Blacksmith and Town Hall.
  • Our eternal love and gratitude for supporting our game <3

By purchasing the Supporter-Pass you are first and foremost showing the developers and the game your support and helping us ensure continued development. We understand that not everyone will want to get this pass and that’s perfectly ok. These items are purely cosmetic, do not affect gameplay and are primarily intended as a way of saying thank you for supporting DwarfHeim!
1405910.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
